name: Weather on the Fritz
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2020 where the theme was: Repair

You are the night shift engineer who was called in to fix the winter weather machine. The machine is dumping tons of snow in the room burying all of the parts that you need to fix the machine and blocking your only exit out of the room. You must now use all of the tools provided to gather the machine parts as well as fix the machine, before you freeze to death.

Project was made by these lovely talented people

Seth Sullivan, Armando Astemborski (@FLG_Helix), Nicholas Burkee (Twitter: @N1ch01a5_Gamer), Zane Cassel, Dimitrius Franks, Alex Weytens, Matthew Myers (Twitter: @GameDevMyers), Joe Minto (Twitter: @legopikmin)
